game.name: DIGI-DOLL
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A relaxing dollhouse decorating simulator featuring text-based discovery. Use the retro DIGI-DOLL console to explore the attic, where choice matters! Unlock various dollhouses, befriend characters, and uncover stunning furnishings as you design and decorate with flair!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A relaxing dollhouse decorating simulator featuring text-based discovery. Use the retro DIGI-DOLL console to explore the attic, where choice matters! Unlock various dollhouses, befriend characters, and uncover stunning furnishings as you design and decorate with flair!
